ttp_template:
<group name="bindings_added_bindings_expired_drop_checksum_drop_other">
  Total number of DHCP packets received: {{TOTAL_RECEIVED | ORPHRASE}}
  Total number of DHCP packets dropped: {{TOTAL_DROPPED | ORPHRASE}}
  Rate limit exceeded: {{DROP_RATE_LIMIT | ORPHRASE}}
  Invalid checksum: {{DROP_CHECKSUM | ORPHRASE}}
  Total number of DHCP bindings added: {{BINDINGS_ADDED | ORPHRASE}}
  Total number of DHCP packets forwarded: {{PACKETS_FORWARDED | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
DHCP Snooping Statistics:
  Total number of DHCP packets received: 12500
  Total number of DHCP packets dropped: 200
    Packet drop reasons:
      Rate limit exceeded: 150
      Invalid checksum: 30
      Other reasons: 20
  Total number of DHCP bindings added: 300
  Total number of DHCP bindings expired: 50
  Total number of DHCP packets forwarded: 12200
textfsm_template:
Value TOTAL_RECEIVED (\d+)
Value TOTAL_DROPPED (\d+)
Value DROP_RATE_LIMIT (\d+)
Value DROP_CHECKSUM (\d+)
Value DROP_OTHER (\d+)
Value BINDINGS_ADDED (\d+)
Value BINDINGS_EXPIRED (\d+)
Value PACKETS_FORWARDED (\d+)

Start
  ^\s*Total number of DHCP packets received:\s+${TOTAL_RECEIVED}\s*$$
  ^\s*Total number of DHCP packets dropped:\s+${TOTAL_DROPPED}\s*$$
  ^\s*Packet drop reasons:\s*$$
  ^\s*Rate limit exceeded:\s+${DROP_RATE_LIMIT}\s*$$
  ^\s*Invalid checksum:\s+${DROP_CHECKSUM}\s*$$
  ^\s*Other reasons:\s+${DROP_OTHER}\s*$$
  ^\s*Total number of DHCP bindings added:\s+${BINDINGS_ADDED}\s*$$
  ^\s*Total number of DHCP bindings expired:\s+${BINDINGS_EXPIRED}\s*$$
  ^\s*Total number of DHCP packets forwarded:\s+${PACKETS_FORWARDED}\s*$$ -> Record
